attributes.additional_details:
Save Garstang from over development.
Planning permission has been submitted to develop a green site on the East side of the A6 between the 2 bridges. It is a behemoth of a development and brings nothing to our small community. Please sign the petition to prevent this over-development of our picturesque rural town.
Please read the planning application at www.wyre.gov.uk, application number 14/00458/OULMAJ
Thank-you for your support.
